title: Corporate Office Complex â€” 200 kW
summary: A modern office complex installation featuring sleek bifacial panels and integrated building management.
description: TechHub Campus chose Third Fuse Energy to install a 200 kW solar system across their three-building office complex. The installation uses premium bifacial panels that capture reflected light, maximizing energy production throughout the day.
highlights: Bifacial panel technology for 15% extra output
60% reduction in common area energy costs

testimonial.quote: The solar installation has become a centerpiece of our sustainability story. Third Fuse Energy understood our vision and delivered beyond expectations.
testimonial.author: Amanda Foster
